comment.author: 76204898@N00
comment._content: Misspelled. General Carlos Rincón Gallardo was a Mexican politician. He was Minister of Agriculture in the closing days of the Huerta regime and chief of the Rurales Corps in the Mexican Revolution. No Wikipedia article yet afaict.

comment.author: 32332138@N03
comment._content: Nos gustaria tener esta foto en el grupo.Gracias. Nous sommes ravis d'avoir cette photo dans grupo.Merci. We are delighted to have this photo in grupo.Thank you. Y de tenerle a Vd. en el grupo.Et de vous garder dans le groupe. And keep you in the group.Und halten Sie in der Gruppe .E vi tengono nel gruppo.A abyste se v rámci skupiny. E mantê-lo no grupo.
